name: The Castle Of Stairs
description:
The Castle of Stairs is a short puzzle game where you have to escape the castle through levels in multiple dimensions.

This game was created for participate on the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1.

The sounds used on this game are downloaded from FreeSound.org.

All the art was made by Laureola and the core gameplay and mechanics by Eric Valero.

Controls:

  • Move: A, D
  • Interact: E
  • Pause game: ESC
